1063070.name: Body Discovery
1063070.description:
Educational journey Through the body in 8 Languages.

- You can see:

1-complete female body and run through it

2- how the circulatory, digestive, urinary, respiratory and the auditory organs
from the inside look like"

3- Names of the organs and the tissues

4- Information about some common disorders

5- How these disorders affect the organs and the tissues

6- these disorders are:

- Cases of the White tongue

- Cases of the (Strawberry) Red tongue

- Cases of the Black hairy tongue

- Causes of dental caries (Tooth decay)

- pharyngitis

- Causes of the heartburn

- Achalasia

- Esophageal varices

- Schatzki Ring

- Causes of the stomach (Peptic) ulcer

- Causes of the diarrhea

- Causes of the constipation

- the colon polyp

- Earwax blockage

- Otitis media

- Asthma

- Smoker's lung
1063070.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 阿拉伯语*, 日语*, 俄语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
